Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via: Western, 51st, Western Boulevard, 55th and Western due to street blockage near Western/55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via: Western, 51st, Western Boulevard, 55th and Western due to street blockage near Western/55th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
